name: Navpoint
description: Take command of the Navigos Traffic Control Station and with the help of a fleet of Police Frigates, Customs Clippers and Tugboats. Guide cargoships, couriers, luxury liners and cruisers safely to their destinations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Take a little getting used to be surprisingly addictive. The only space traffic control game Ive ever played :D
